title: Diva Hetairai (The Rise of the Diva in Pop Music in the 21st Century) Preview How We Got Here #11
description:
The Hetairai were the elite courtesans of ancient Greece. Beautiful women known for their refined skills and culture. One of them was viewed daily as she strolled to take her bath in the waters of Corinth. Her baths were a public pastime. She was celebrated for her erotic charms. And charged for her services accordingly. She died a toothless beggar on the streets.

In the early 21st Century a postmodern form of Hetaira was emerged, created by the large media conglomerates of the time. Their performances were filled with seduction and histrionics. They often were known by single names. Their shows and music drew in millions. This was before 2020. 

This video is a sober reflection of this unique moment in music history.
